text: Bill Tom (March 8, 1923 - October 31, 2012) was an American gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1956 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco
title: Bill Tom
